title: Wild Robot
plot: An animated adventure about a robot stranded on an island.

title: Chennai Express
plot: A man travels to Tamil Nadu to immerse his grandfather's ashes.

title: It ends with us
plot: A woman's relationship becomes complicated when her first love returns.

title: Moana
plot: A spirited teenager sails out on a daring mission to save her people.

title: Cars
plot: A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs.

title: Garfield
plot: A lazy cat must save his owner and a dog from a kidnapping scheme.

title: Stranger Things
plot: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces.

title: Never Have I Ever
plot: A coming-of-age comedy-drama about an Indian-American teenager navigating high school.

title: Ginny & Georgia
plot: A mother and daughter duo navigate life together in a small New England town.

title: Queen of Tears
plot: A romantic drama about a married couple facing a crisis.

title: The Crown
plot: Follows the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign.

title: The Office
plot: A mockumentary on a group of typical office workers in Scranton, PA.

title: My Oxford Year
plot: An ambitious American student travels to Oxford in England to fulfill her dream, but encounters a charming local who changes both their lives.

title: How to Train Your Dragon
plot: On the rugged isle of Berk, a Viking boy named Hiccup defies centuries of tradition by befriending a dragon named Toothless. However, when an ancient threat emerges that endangers both species, Hiccup's friendship with Toothless becomes the key to forging a new future. Together, they must navigate the delicate path toward peace, soaring beyond the boundaries of their worlds and redefining what it means to be a hero and a leader.

title: The Ruse
plot: An in-home caregiver fears for her life after being assigned to a mysterious elderly patient in a remote seaside home.

title: Good Boy
plot: Olympic medallists join the police force through a special recruitment program, trading medals for badges as they tackle violent crimes and injustices with their athletic skills.

title: The Rings of Power
plot: This series brings to screens for the very first time the heroic legends of the fabled Second Age of Middle-earth's history. This epic drama is set thousands of years before the events of J.R.R. Tolkien's "The Hobbit" and "The Lord of the Rings," and takes viewers back to an era in which great powers were forged, kingdoms rose to glory and fell to ruin, unlikely heroes were tested, hope hung by the finest of threads and the greatest villain that ever flowed from Tolkien's pen threatened to cover all the world in darkness. Beginning in a time of relative peace, the series follows an ensemble cast of characters, both familiar and new, as they confront the long-feared reemergence of evil to Middle-earth. From the darkest depths of the Misty Mountains, to the majestic forests of the elf-capital of Lindon, to the breathtaking island kingdom of NÃºmenor, to the furthest reaches of the map, these kingdoms and characters carve out legacies that live on long after they are gone.
directors: J. D. Payne and Patrick McKay
genre: Action, Adventure, Science fiction, Drama, Mystery

title: Friends
plot: Follow the lives of six reckless adults living in Manhattan, as they indulge in adventures which make their lives both troublesome and happening.
